description:
Play the game to help us figure out what WE should be thinking about when trying to understand how people solve complex problems.

“When you play a game — if you learn to be good at it — you find what it is you should have been thinking about” (John Conway).

#### How to play
* [Video tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zJxYbYzvgQQ)

#### ScienceAtHome    
* To contribute to our research, make sure you play our games with an active internet connection, as we are gathering data for our scientists based on your performance.
* [Data policy](http://scienceathome.org/our-data-policy/)
* [Science publications](http://scienceathome.org/science/) derived from game data
summary: Learn about solving complex problems by playing a game
author: ScienceAtHome
